author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Add RPD in the latest version of 2023 Gemetry as requested by the ZDC group for the next HI simulation effort

#### PR validation:

Test using th4 g4 overlap tool

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

May be required to be backported to 13_2_X for HI simulation effort
title: Run3-gex174 Add RPD in the latest version of 2023 Gemetry as requested by the ZDC group for the next HI simulation effort
